data.name: Warface — "Asgard" set
data.detailed_description:
About the "Asgard" set


We're glad to present a new thematic set of items that will delight our Engineer fans. Einar Fredriksson, aka agent "Viking" has joined their ranks. The set includes unique weapons and camouflages, as well as memorable charms, which will become an excellent addition to class specific weapons.



The set includes the agent "Viking" skin, 3 weapons, 3 camouflages, 3 charms and achievements. All items are permanent.

Agent "Viking"

"Engineer Einar Fredriksson, aka agent ""Viking"" is an experienced soldier, that has proven himself in battles. Einar began his career in the National Army, and during several months of his service, he became an excellent sapper. Sometime later, Fredriksson ended his contract and created a private military company.

The skin has a bonus: it increases the sprint distance by 60%. "

Asgard Quarter Circle 10 SMG Custom

The submachine gun has a good rate of fire and high damage, which will allow you to fight at medium and short ranges.



Asgard TEC-9

This is an automatic pistol with a high hip-fire and aiming accuracy. It also boasts good damage. It's a great secondary weapon due to its impressive characteristics. It is also possible to attach scopes, including the unique Leupold DeltaPoint MK1, which improves accuracy and reduces recoil, as well as increases the ADS speed.



Asgard Khopesh

It is similar in characteristics to the Gerber Tomahawk. The Khopesh has an increased range and lethal force. Its secondary melee attack is so strong that it can even kill an enemy in an anti-melee vest.



Thematic charms

The set includes 3 thematic charms that will decorate your weapon: "Rune Compass", "Horned Helmet" and "Defused Bomb"!

Unique achievements

The set includes unique achievements in the agent's style. And by destroying enemies using weapons from the "Asgard" series, you will earn special distinctions. Decorate your profile with them!








After payment the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: The set includes the new agent Viking skin, thematic weapons, bright camouflages, cool charms and much more.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
